thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 8 of 178
thread.title: Tanya Jones

author: Tanya Jones
title: Tanya Jones
text:
I was referred to Trusted House Sitters by a friend and wow i am so glad i took her advise!
I found the website is very user friendly and the online chat staff are a wonderful help.
After setting up my profile and posting my first sitting job, within the first few hours i already had a handfull of quality sitters applying, it was a hard choice they were all wonderful!
I was so thrilled with the couple that came to house sit for me and look after my two dogs while i went on holidays. My dogs were so well looked after and the house was kept immaculate!
I would most definitely recommend Trusted House Sitters to anyone needing reliable house sitters.
Thanks guys!!!!
